valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 16 Dec 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 17 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: New low expected Biscay 1013 by 1800 Tuesday. Lows northwest France 1000 and Southeast Iceland 974 losing their identities

In southeast, southerly veering westerly or southwesterly, 3 to 5, occasionally 6. In northwest, westerly or southwesterly 3 to 5, increasing 5 or 6.

In southeast, rain. In northwest, fair.
Visibility
In southeast, good, occasionally moderate. In northwest, good.
